attributes.action: Require restaurants to offer a non-religiously slaughtered meat option
attributes.additional_details: The Government should implement a new law that makes it a legal requirement for food establishments to offer a non-religiously slaughtered meat option for people to choose.
attributes.background: Some food establishments only offer meat that has been religiously slaughtered. I believe this could isolate some of the population who do not eat religiously slaughtered meat.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
